information

Class InformationCenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • information.InformationCenter

  • public class InformationCenter
extends java.lang.Object
    InformationCenter contains all saved information: ImageLayers and their images and markings.
    Author:
    Antti

        Returns:

      • setImageLayerList

        public void setImageLayerList(java.util.ArrayList<ImageLayer> iLayerList)
        Sets new list of ImageLayers: replaces the older one after checking correctness of new ImageLayers by method addImageLayers. If null parameter is given -> creates new empty list
        Parameters:
        iLayerList - ArrayList contains the ImageLayer objects

        Parameters:

      • addSingleImageLayer

        private void addSingleImageLayer(ImageLayer layer)
        Adds single ImageLayer to InformationCenter.imageLayerList if no image with same name already in list. Gives unique IDs to ImageLayer and its MarkinLayers. Sets the ImageLayer selected if no any ImageLayer is selected already.
        Parameters:
        layer - ImageLayer that is added to list

      • getSelectedImageLayerOneUp

        public int getSelectedImageLayerOneUp()
        Returns ID of ImageLayer which is above selected ImageLayer in ImageLayerInfo and preceding in list of ImageLayers.
        Returns:
        the ImageLayer preceding selected ImageLayer. Negative value returned if not found.

      • getSelectedImageLayerOneDown

        public int getSelectedImageLayerOneDown()
        Returns ID of ImageLayer which is below selected ImageLayer in ImageLayerInfo and descending in list of ImageLayers.
        Returns:
        the ImageLayer descending selected ImageLayer. Negative value returned if not found.

        Returns ID of MarkingLayer which is above selected MarkingLayer in ImageLayerInfo and preceding in list of MarkingLayers.
        Returns:
        the MarkingLayer preceding selected MarkingLayer. Negative value returned if not found.

      • setSelectedImageLayer

        private void setSelectedImageLayer(ImageLayer selectedImageLayer)
        Sets the given ImageLayer as selectedImageLayer and checks is the selectedMarkingLayerProper. If selectedMarkingLayer is not proper (not found) the new one is selected from MarkinLayers of selectedImageLayer.
        Parameters:
        selectedImageLayer - The ImageLayer to set as selectedImageLayer

        Parameters:

        Returns:
